short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to remind users to take a break, move fast or slow, wonder and relax after using the Chrome browser for some time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome Extension has 2 main functions:
1. It reminds young learners to take a break with Brain Boost Time after every 60 minutes on the Chrome browser as long as the feature is on (toggled off with a greyscale icon when clicked on pinned logo)
2. It can be used by teachers to set a timer for Brain Boost Time using the omnibox or URL address bar. e.g. Type 'bbt' and hit the spacebar to set the timer with a number and unit 's'/'m'/'h' for seconds, minutes or hours. Include a message after the time set otherwise a default message will appear.
